short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces the text 'artificial intelligence' with 'natural stupidity'.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
“Artificial Intelligence is no match for natural stupidity” —Alan Kay

Based on Steven Frank's popular "Cloud to Butt" extension, this extension will replace the text "artificial intelligence", "AI", etc. with "natural stupidity".

Icon: User By Gregor Črešnar on the Noun Project.
